original_text: Whereof I was made a minister, according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power.
korean_text: 이 복음을 위하여 그의 능력이 역사하시는 대로 내게 주신 하나님의 은혜의 선물을 따라 내가 일꾼이 되었노라

sentences.original_text: Whereof I was made a minister
according to the gift of the grace of God
by the effectual working of his power
